overview: When Darin Silvers broaches the subject of his brother coming out, it stimulates a first-time gay experience with his longtime straight buddy Andy Bank. Luca Rosso patiently reassures virgin Zander Cole that his parents won't walk in on their encounter. Birthday boy Scott Demarco gets a pleasant surprise from Ethan Slade when he starts jerking off in his bedroom. Straight buddy Jay Austin gives into gay player Jack Hunter while their friend fixes a sandwich downstairs.
title: Virgin Bros Get Fucked
